markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Ydersius](/Deities.aspx?ID=211)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 237 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

The serpentfolk god is not dead, but in his decapitated state, he might as well be. Reduced to a feral, animalistic existence, Ydersius is even less aware of his legacy than the lowest of the aapoph. Ydersius’s symbol is a snake’s skull surrounded by a skeletal ouroboros.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** seek to return Ydersius to life, fulfill your passions, conquer your foes with no mercy, achieve glory for serpentkind

**Anathema** put the needs of others above those of serpentfolk, aid the spawn of Azlant

**Follower Alignments**
LE, NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

**Favored Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)

**Domains** [Ambition](/Domains.aspx?ID=1), [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=16), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Magic Fang](/Spells.aspx?ID=179)

- **5th**
[Cloudkill](/Spells.aspx?ID=42)

- **6th**
[Purple Worm Sting](/Spells.aspx?ID=242)

</column>
name: Ydersius
